descriptionHtml:
[color=#1e84cc][size=6][b][font=Georgia]        DESCRIPTION[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS]DragonPerch[/font][/b][/size][size=3] is a Player [font=Georgia]HOME[/font] inside [/size][size=4]Dragonsreach....[/size]

[size=3]Have you ever wanted to live inside Dragonsreach? Now you can![/size]
[size=3] I made this mod some time ago for my own personal use, I though if no one was using all that extra room in Dragonsreach then it should be put to good use! And what better use then Housing the Thane of Whiterun or even better yet, 'The Dragonborn', Makes sense to keep The Dragonborn around close to protect the Palace..[/size]


[size=3] [/size]
[size=3]I just updated it with some new furnishings to make it more comfortable, includes an Enchanter and Alchemy Workbench & supplies, Lots of Mannequins and storage....Out on the great porch is a Forge, Armor Workbench, Tanning Rack & Sharping Wheel..Also contains a chest full of supplies, Do not store your things in this chest. There is a Storage Chest where you may store your things- Non-Respawn- on Top - Boss Chest..You can use the trapdoor near the armor workbench to travel to Whiterun Stables.[/size]

[size=3]Don't start Mod while inside Dragonsreach, The Mannequins won't be in their place...If they are scattered all over Dragonsreach, Go outside and come back in they should all be in place..[/size]

[size=3]This mod probably won't work with any other mod changing the same area...[/size]
[size=3]If you run across any problems please let me know, I will try to fix them asap :)[/size]
[size=3]I will be updating ...[/size]
[font=Georgia][size=5]*******REQUIRES************[/size][/font]
[/color][color=#1e84cc][size=3]Latest Version of Skyrim & update. No DLC Required..[/size]

[size=3]*******[/size][font=Georgia][size=5]Install[/size][/font][size=3]****** [/size]
[size=3]Just drop the files into your 'Data' Folder ..[/size]
[size=3]Hope you enjoy the mod..[/size]

[size=3]*****[/size][font=Georgia][size=5]ChangeLog[/size][/font][size=3]:[/size]
[size=3]Version 1.5 Added a trap door to the Smithy that leads to Whiterun Stables, Added clutter..[/size]
[size=3]Version 1.1 Now has a Smithy Out on the Great porch..[/size]

[size=3]************[/size][font=Georgia][size=5]Credits[/size][/font][size=3]***********[/size]

author: IceSpiders
